member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail
member.summary: Describes the details of a Financial Aid Satisfactory Academic Progress evaluation

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.EvaluationPeriodAttemptedCredits
member.summary: The number of credits, or units, the student attempted during the evaluation period.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.EvaluationPeriodCompletedCredits
member.summary: The number of credits, or units, the student completed during the evaluation period.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.EvaluationPeriodGpaCredits
member.summary: The number of credits the student completed for courses flagged as GPA-contributing courses during the evaluation period

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.EvaluationPeriodCompletedGradePoints
member.summary: The number of grade points completed completed during the evaluation period.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.EvaluationPeriodGpaGradePoints
member.summary: The number of grade points the student earned for courses flagged as GPA-contributing courses during the evaluation period.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.EvaluationPeriodCompletedGpa
member.summary: The student's completed GPA for the evaluation period calculated by dividing the completed grade points by the completed credits

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.EvaluationPeriodOverallGpa
member.summary: The student's overall GPA based on courses flagged as GPA-contributing courses during the evaluation period. Calculated by dividing credits by grade points from those GPA-contributing courses.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.EvaluationPeriodRateOfCompletion
member.summary: The pace (rate) of completion within the evaluation period. Calculated by dividing completed credits by attempted credits. Represented as a decimal between 0 and 1.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.CumulativeAttemptedCredits
member.summary: The number of cumulative credits, or units, including remedial credits the student has attempted.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.CumulativeCompletedCredits
member.summary: The number of cumulative credits, or units, including remedial credits the student has completed

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.CumulativeGpaCredits
member.summary: The number of cumulative credits the student completed for courses flagged as GPA-contributing courses

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.CumulativeCompletedGradePoints
member.summary: The number of cumulative grade points including remedial credits the student has completed.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.CumulativeGpaGradePoints
member.summary: The number of cumulative grade points the student earned for courses flagged as GPA-contributing courses

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.CumulativeCompletedGpa
member.summary: The student's cumulative completed GPA calculated by dividing the completed grade points by the completed credits including remedial credits

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.CumulativeOverallGpa
member.summary: The student's cumulative overall GPA based on courses flagged as GPA-contributing courses. Calculated by dividing credits by grade points from those GPA-contributing courses.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.CumulativeRateOfCompletion
member.summary: The student's cumulative pace (rate) of completion calculated by dividing cumulative completed credits by cumulative attempted credits including remedial credits. Represented as a decimal between 0 and 1

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.CumulativeAttemptedCreditsExcludingRemedial
member.summary: The number of cumulative credits, or units, excluding remedial credits the student has attempted.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.CumulativeCompletedCreditsExcludingRemedial
member.summary: The number of cumulative credits, or units, excluding remedial credits the student has completed.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AcademicProgressEvaluationDetail.CumulativeRateOfCompletionExcludingRemedial
member.summary: The student's cumulative pace (rate) of completion calculated by dividing cumulative completed credits by cumulative attempted credits excluding remedial credits.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AwardPackageChangeRequest
member.summary: AwardPackageChangeRequest object provides a way for API consumers to request updates to a student's award package. At this time, change requests can only be created to decline awards and change loan amounts. Check the student's FinancialAidConfiguration for the award year to see if change requests are required for these types of changes.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AwardPackageChangeRequest.Id
member.summary: The database Id of the Award Change Request record

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AwardPackageChangeRequest.StudentId
member.summary: The StudentId to whom this change request applies. Required for POST AwardPackageChangeRequest request

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AwardPackageChangeRequest.AwardYearId
member.summary: The AwardYear to which this change request applies Required for POST AwardPackageChangeRequest request

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AwardPackageChangeRequest.AwardId
member.summary: The AwardId to which this change request applies Required for POST AwardPackageChangeRequest StudentAward request

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AwardPackageChangeRequest.AssignedToCounselorId
member.summary: The Colleague PERSON id of the financial aid counselor to whom this request is assigned

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AwardPackageChangeRequest.CreateDateTime
member.summary: The date and time this Change Request was submitted and entered into the database.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AwardPackageChangeRequest.AwardPeriodChangeRequests
member.summary: This is a list of AwardPeriodChangeRequest objects. Changes will only be requested for the award periods specified in this list. If you don't specify any period requests in this list, an exception will be thrown. In a POST AwardPackageChangeRequest request, some award period changes may be rejected outright by the system. Inspect the AwardPeriodChangeRequest's Status and StatusReason attributes for details.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AwardPackageChangeRequest.OverrideUnsubsidizedLoanCheck
member.summary: This is a flag that will determine whether or not to override the check found in AwardPackageChangeRequestsDomainService Defaultly set to false via optional parameter in SS

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AwardPackageChangeRequestStatus
member.summary: An enumeration of the various statuses of an AwardPackageChangeRequest

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AwardPackageChangeRequestStatus.New
member.summary: Indicates the change request is new and needs to be processed by the system. This is the default status

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AwardPackageChangeRequestStatus.Pending

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AwardStatusCategory.Estimated
member.summary: The Estimated category implies that an action needs to be taken on this award. The student or financial aid officer must decide whether to accept or reject an award with an Estimated category. Estimated and Pending are generally the same thing

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.AwardStatusCategory.Rejected

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetConfiguration
member.summary: Configuration options for creating financial aid shopping sheets

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetConfiguration.CustomMessageRuleTableId
member.summary: This identifies the rule table that calculates custom messages to print on a shopping sheet for a given student

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetConfiguration.OfficeType
member.summary: This type is used by the FA Shopping Sheet to configure the scorecard graphics on the right side of the shopping sheet.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetConfiguration.GraduationRate
member.summary: This number is used on the shopping sheet to produce a slider bar to graphically show students and parents the school's graduation rate. This attribute could be null if the Department of Education does not provide the institution with a graduation rate.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetConfiguration.LoanDefaultRate
member.summary: This number is used on the shopping sheet to produce a bar graph that shows how the school's loan default rate stacks up against the loan default rate of comparable institutions in the United States. This attribute could be null if the Department of Education does not provide the institution with a loan default rate.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetConfiguration.NationalLoanDefaultRate
member.summary: This number is used on the shopping sheet to produce a bar graph that shows how the school's loan default rate stacks up against the loan default rate of comparable institutions in the United States. This attribute could be null if the Department of Education does not provide the institution with a national loan default rate.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetConfiguration.MedianBorrowingAmount
member.summary: This number is used on the shopping sheet to explain to students and parents the median borrowing amount of students at the school. This attribute could be null if the Department of Education does not provide the institution with a median borrowing amount.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetConfiguration.MedianMonthlyPaymentAmount
member.summary: This number is used on the shopping sheet to explain the median amount that students typically pay each month to pay off their loans over ten years. This attribute could be null if the Department of Education does not provide the institution with a median monthly payment amount.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetConfiguration.EfcOption
member.summary: The EfcOption allows schools who use the College Board PROFILE application to display the Estimated Family Contribution on the shopping sheet as calculated by the College Board instead of the Department of Education.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetConfiguration.LowToMediumBoundary
member.summary: This number is used with the Graduation Rate slider. It defines the boundary between low and medium.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetConfiguration.MediumToHighBoundary
member.summary: This number is used with the Graduation Rate slider. It defines the boundary between medium and high.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetConfiguration.InstitutionRepaymentRate
member.summary: This number is used on the shopping sheet to produce a bar graph that shows how the school's loan repayment rate stacks up against the loan repayment rate of comparable institutions in the United States. This attribute could be null if the Department of Education does not provide the institution with an institutional loan repayment rate.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetConfiguration.NationalRepaymentRateAverage
member.summary: This number is used on the shopping sheet to produce a bar graph that shows how the school's loan repayment rate stacks up against the loan repayment rate of comparable institutions in the United States. This attribute could be null if the Department of Education does not provide the institution with a national loan repayment rate.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetEfcOption
member.summary: Each option identifies which EFC to use on the ShoppingSheet

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetEfcOption.IsirEfc
member.summary: Always use the Federally Flagged ISIR EFC

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetEfcOption.ProfileEfcUntilIsirExists
member.summary: Use the Institutionally flagged PROFILE EFC until an ISIR becomes Federally Flagged.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetEfcOption.ProfileEfc
member.summary: Always use the Institutionally flagged PROFILE EFC

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetOfficeType
member.summary: The ShoppingSheetOfficeType is used to configure the shopping sheet's scorecard graphics, particularly the graduation rate.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetOfficeType.BachelorDegreeGranting
member.summary: A financial aid office assigned this type is primarily a bachelor's degree granting office. Shopping sheet will display the percentage of full-time students who graduate within 6 years.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetOfficeType.AssociateDegreeGranting
member.summary: A financial aid office assigned this type is primarily an associate's degree granting office. Shopping sheet will display the percentage of full-time students who graduate within 150% of the expected time for completion.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetOfficeType.CertificateGranting
member.summary: A financial aid office assigned this type is primarily a certificate granting office. Shopping sheet will display the percentage of full-time students who graduate within 150% of the expected time for completion.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetOfficeType.GraduateDegreeGranting
member.summary: A financial aid office assigned this type is primarily a graduate degree granting office. Shopping sheet will display the percentage of full-time undergraduate students who graduate within 150% of the expected time for completion.

member.name: F:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.ShoppingSheetOfficeType.NonDegreeGranting
member.summary: A financial aid office assigned this type is primarily a non-degree granting office. Shopping sheet will display the percentage of full-time students who graduate within 150% of the expected time for completion.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.StudentLoanLimitation
member.summary: A StudentLoanLimitation describes the parameters within which a student can request changes to their loans. Clients should check the StudentAwards against these limitations before using the PUT StudentAward or PUT StudentAwardPackage. Those endpoints will throw exceptions if the requested changes are beyond the limits set in this object.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.StudentLoanLimitation.AwardYear
member.summary: The AwardYear that these loan limits apply to.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.StudentLoanLimitation.StudentId
member.summary: The StudentId that these loan limits apply to

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.StudentLoanLimitation.SubsidizedMaximumAmount
member.summary: The maximum Subsidized loan amount that the student is eligible to borrow. The sum of all subsidized loan awards must be less than or equal to this amount.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.StudentLoanLimitation.UnsubsidizedMaximumAmount
member.summary: The maximum Unsubsidized loan amount that the student is eligible to borrow. The sum of all unsubsidized loan awards must be less than or equal to this amount.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.StudentLoanLimitation.GradPlusMaximumAmount
member.summary: The maximum GradPLUS loan amount that the student is eligible to borrow. It is calculated based on the unmet need amount. The sum of all graduate PLUS loans must be less than or equal to this amount.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Dtos.FinancialAid.StudentLoanLimitation.SuppressStudentMaximumAmounts
member.summary: Flag indicating whether the loan max amounts should be suppressed for the year on the student level
